text: Alfred Muller (23 December 1940 – 13 November 2020), was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1993 to 1997. He also was the Mayor of Schiltigheim from 1977 to 2008. He was born in Strasbourg, France. He was a member of the Socialist Party. Muller died on 13 November 2020 at the age of 79.Alfred Muller, maire emblématique de Schiltigheim, s’est éteint ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Strasbourg
title: Alfred Muller
